name: LD#35 - Death has many Forms
description:
A LD#35 jam entry collab with @oneseedfruit, Death has many Forms.

"Have you ever felt like death just passed by you, without you knowing? Perhaps it did. It just took a comforting form. In this game, you play as the Grim Reaper. Claim ONLY humans that are marked with an X, ignore humans without an X or there will be consequences - Take a form they are comfortable in - like a cat, or a ball to glide by them without claiming their soul."

Instructions:

LEFT and RIGHT key to move
LEFT SHIFT to switch to ball form, LEFT SHIFT again to go back to Grim Reaper form
RIGHT SHIFT to switch to cat form, RIGHT SHIFT again to go back to Grim Reaper form
ONLY CLAIM HUMANS WITH AN "X" ABOVE THEIR HEAD
Ignore humans with no "X" by changing to a form that are shown above their head. Running into them in Grim Reaper form WILL take their souls forcefully.

Art assets, music by me
Coding (in Unity) by ranmaru90
